INSTRUCTIONS.STARTVIEW:
Welcome to the start page!
Here, you can choose whether to create a new game or join an existing game.
INSTRUCTIONS.PINVIEW: Here, you enter the Lobby ID displayed on the screen of the person who created the game.
INSTRUCTIONS.NOQUESTIONS: On this page, you can choose how many questions should be included in your game.
INSTRUCTIONS.LANGUAGECHOICE: On this page, you can select the language in which participants will see the questions.
INSTRUCTIONS.NAMEVIEW: Here, you choose the name you will use in the game.
INSTRUCTIONS.CAMERAVIEW:
Here, you select your avatar for the game.
You can either take a picture by starting the camera or choose one of the available avatars.
INSTRUCTIONS.AVATARVIEW: Here, you can see your finished avatar. When you're ready, you can proceed to the lobby by clicking 'Join the game'.
INSTRUCTIONS.ADMINLOBBYVIEW:
This is the lobby where you can see all the participants.
Wait until all participants are ready before starting the game.
INSTRUCTIONS.LOBBYVIEW:
This is the lobby where you can see all the participants.
When all participants are ready, the admin will start the game.
INSTRUCTIONS.POLLVIEW:
On this page, you can vote for your fellow players
by dragging and dropping their avatars.
INSTRUCTIONS.RESULTVIEW:
Well done!
Here, you can see the results of the game. If you want to play again, you can click 'Start a new game'.
